video.title: Peep Show
video.synopsis: Thrown out by his girlfriend, slacker Jeremy moves in with his friend Mark, who has a very different -- but still dysfunctional -- view of the world.

episodes.synopsis: Despite being bullied on the street by the local children, Mark sets himself the task of sleeping with the divorcee next door.
episodes.title: Warring Factions

episodes.synopsis: Jeremy and Super Hans's band, the Hair Blair Bunch, is going nowhere, so Jeremy reluctantly agrees to go for a job working in Mark's office.
episodes.title: The Interview

episodes.synopsis: Mark and Jeremy go "on the pull" and find themselves smoking pot in the Lazerbowl toilets with a teenage goth.
episodes.title: On the Pull

episodes.synopsis: Mark makes a friend at a business conference -- but will it turn into more than just friendship?
episodes.title: Mark Makes a Friend

episodes.synopsis: Jeremy tries to wow Toni with his new job in a music studio while Mark gets passed over for promotion in favor of Sophie.
episodes.title: Dream Job

episodes.synopsis: Death and terminal illness prove to be the keys to romantic success for Mark and Jeremy.
episodes.title: Funeral

episodes.synopsis: Mark and Jeremy join Sophie's dance class. Jeremy tells Toni he loves her.
episodes.title: Dance Class

episodes.synopsis: Mark's lack of success with Sophie is compensated when he makes a new friend at the office.
episodes.title: Jeremy Makes It

episodes.synopsis: When Jeff goes on a work trip with Sophie to Aberdeen, Mark becomes fearful that they will sleep together and is desperate to stop them.
episodes.title: Local Hero

episodes.synopsis: Mark, determined to forget Sophie, makes an effort to go out with April but manages to blur the line between enthusiastic new boyfriend and stalker.
episodes.title: University Challenge

episodes.synopsis: Mark's depressed about Sophie living with Jeff, but Jeremy's not sure self-mutilation is the answer. Besides, Jeremy and Jeff are getting on well.
episodes.title: The Man Show

episodes.synopsis: Jeremy and Nancy are getting married, for visa reasons. Mark, determined to save his friend, will do whatever it takes.
episodes.title: Wedding

episodes.synopsis: Mark gets mugged by two teenagers who steal his Blackberry.
episodes.title: Mugging

episodes.synopsis: Merry, an eccentric old friend from university, is back on the scene, and she offers Jeremy the chance to manage her bar.
episodes.title: Sectioning

episodes.synopsis: Jeremy plans to throw a secret drugs party in the flat, where he hopes to seduce his ex-girlfriend, Big Suze.
episodes.title: Shrooming

episodes.synopsis: Mark's plans for a week off work go wrong when his sister comes to stay.
episodes.title: Sisterning

episodes.synopsis: Jeremy gets called up on jury service but falls for the female defendant.
episodes.title: Jurying

episodes.synopsis: Mark is worried that he's drifting apart from Sophie, so immediate action is required: He must propose.
episodes.title: Quantocking

episodes.synopsis: Mark is invited to spend Sophie's birthday weekend down at her parents' house, but he foolishly invites Jeremy along.
episodes.title: Sophie's Parents

episodes.synopsis: At the annual JLB conference, Mark's boss tells him he has to give a presentation in front of the entire board.
episodes.title: Conference

episodes.synopsis: Mark is still having doubts about marrying Sophie, so he joins a gym in order to spend as much time away from her as possible.
episodes.title: Gym

episodes.synopsis: Jeremy meets his hero -- techno musician Russell "the Orgazoid" -- and ends up working as his handyman.
episodes.title: Handyman

episodes.synopsis: As Mark's best man, Jeremy has organized a stag weekend.
episodes.title: Holiday

episodes.synopsis: It's the big day: Mark is getting married to Sophie.
episodes.title: The Wedding

episodes.synopsis: Mark rediscovers single life after his disastrous wedding to Sophie, and he and Jeremy become victims of crime.
episodes.title: Burgling

episodes.synopsis: Mark and Sophie return to work after their nonexistent honeymoon, and Mark tries to deflect the inevitable bad PR attached to a jilter.
episodes.title: Spin War

episodes.synopsis: Jeremy finally runs out of money and finds himself on a downward spiral of hunger, homelessness and criminality.
episodes.title: Jeremy Broke

episodes.synopsis: Jeremy's mother comes to visit for a family funeral. Her new boyfriend is a military man whom Jeremy deeply resents and whom Mark idolizes.
episodes.title: Jeremy's Mummy

episodes.synopsis: Jeremy and Super Hans get a band manager and play at a Christian rock festival. Mark comes along as their roadie.
episodes.title: Jeremy's Manager

episodes.synopsis: Mark gets into online gaming and live role-play with Dobby and wonders whether she may really be "the one."
episodes.title: Mark's Women

episodes.synopsis: Newly promoted Mark decides to enjoy his additional power and wealth by splashing out on a boiler and by finding Jeremy a job in the office.
episodes.title: Jeremy at JLB

episodes.synopsis: Mark makes a final play for Dobby, the object of his desires. Meanwhile, Jeremy meets a new love, Russian émigré Elena.
episodes.title: The Test

episodes.synopsis: Jeremy realizes that he's in love with Elena and decides to be less selfish in order to win her affection.
episodes.title: Jeremy in Love

episodes.synopsis: Mark discovers that Jeremy's girlfriend, Elena, has a guilty secret. But should he tell him when Jez is clearly so happy?
episodes.title: The Affair

episodes.synopsis: As a last desperate hurrah before the baby arrives, Mark and Jeremy decide to throw a party.
episodes.title: The Party

episodes.synopsis: Elena and Gail's wedding is imminent, but Jeremy is busy plotting how to get rid of Gail and win Elena back.
episodes.title: Das Boot

episodes.synopsis: Mark and Jeremy are at the hospital awaiting the birth of Mark's baby. Sophie doesn't want Mark to transfer any of his anxiety to the baby.
episodes.title: St. Hospital's

episodes.synopsis: Dobby, the object of Mark's desires, is going out with Simon, a graphic designer. Mark and Gerrard form the "Dobby Club," devoted to winning her over.
episodes.title: Man Jam

episodes.synopsis: Jeremy attempts to impress Zahra by holding a book group at the flat, although, apart from Mr. Nice, he has never actually read a book.
episodes.title: A Beautiful Mind

episodes.synopsis: It's christening day for his baby, and Mark arranges to pick up Jeremy, the baby's godfather, from Zahra's flat on his way to the church.
episodes.title: Nether Zone

episodes.synopsis: It's Christmas Day, and Mark has invited his parents over for lunch. He has planned everything in detail, but Jeremy has become overexcited.
episodes.title: Seasonal Beatings

episodes.synopsis: It's New Year's Eve, and Mark is depressed about Dobby, but Jeremy is determined for the El Dude Brothers to enjoy the night of their lives.
episodes.title: New Year's Eve

episodes.synopsis: Mark has asked Dobby to move in with him, and Jeremy is faced with the prospect of moving out to make way. But Jeremy has been dragging his heels and Mark is increasingly worried that Dobby will move in with his rival Gerrard instead.
episodes.title: Jeremy Therapised

episodes.synopsis: Mark gets a lucky break when his book, 'Business Secrets of the Pharaohs', is accepted by a 'publisher'. Jeremy, in an attempt to kick-start his career, enrols on a life-coaching course.
episodes.title: Business Secrets of the Pharaohs

episodes.synopsis: Simon, Dobby's ex-boyfriend, invites Mark, Dobby, Jeremy and Super Hans to join him and his friends for a paintballing weekend. Mark is convinced that Simon is using the weekend as a cover to get back with Dobby, while Jeremy prepares to life coach.
episodes.title: The Love Bunker

episodes.synopsis: Mark employs a decorator, Andy, to repaint the kitchen, and Jeremy helps out by giving him free 'life-coaching' advice. Meanwhile, Mark enrols on a business studies evening course and meets Stephanie, an attractive older woman.
episodes.title: Big Mad Andy

episodes.synopsis: Jeremy, desperate to find somewhere else to live, sparks up an old relationship with Mark's sister Sara, and moves in with her and son, Joshy. Mark, meanwhile, launches a campaign to be elected chairman of the freehold committee of Apollo House.
episodes.title: Chairman Mark

episodes.synopsis: Dobby is offered a job in New York. While she's still on the horns of a dilemma Mark - who thinks she's lying - suggests they spend a weekend in the country - the perfect time, as far as Jeremy is concerned, to get a few things off his chest.
episodes.title: Quantocking II
